name: Auckland City Hotel-Hobson St

reviews.text: We spent one night at this Hotel in a two bedroom apartment. Our apartment appeared to be nearly brand new. The apartment would be excellent for a long term stay. The was a full kitchen (oven, hob, dishwasher, microwave, pots, etc). Plus, a washing machine, iron, ironing board and 2 LCD TV's (only 6 channels!). The rooms were very clean and quiet and the hotel is well located to the city and transport facilities. Staff were helpful and looked after our luggage after we checked out in the morning till the late afternoon.
reviews.title: New and very clean

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The hotel is across the road from the city mission. There were a couple of street type people about, however they took no notice of 2 females walking back to their hotel after midnight.
reviews.title: Great price and right in the center of Auckland

reviews.text: Overall - Great value, great location, great service, very clean, new, would definitely stay again.
reviews.title: Clean, Modern and Comfortable in downtown Auckland

likes.liked: — stylish, clean rooms for great price

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My understanding is that this hotel was just renovated and re-named. A very nice set up downtown close to the sky tower and really good restaurants. It was a large sleeping room, clean, new bedding and furniture. And curtains that stayed shut and kept it dark. With a separate small kitchenette (sink, microwave, burners, coffee pot etc...) and tv area. Very close to some student housing but no noise problems. We thought we got an awesome deal for the dollar...about 100 american dollars a night for the three of us, with two queen sized beds. The only problem is that July is winter in New Zealand and they have a small plug in thermal heater that was a joke, on high it kept the room at about 58 degrees, but we weren't in much. This hotel was located by wotif.com. I would go back in a New York minute.
reviews.title: loved the set up

reviews.text: No where to stop the car and check in resulted in a parking ticket. Great start.
reviews.title: Definitely not 4 star

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Rooms are clean - NIL air conditioning. In freezing conditions you are given a tiny oil heater thats a waste of time so slept fully clothed to keep warm.
reviews.title: nice new hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Would NOT recommend staying here. Look elsewhere
reviews.title: Cold

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Brand new apartment style rooms with a full kitchenette, LCD TV, and nice bathrooms. The location is also good, just a couple of blocks from Queen Street and a 15 minute walk from the ferry piers. I would agree with some of the other commenters that the heating isn't the greatest, but the price sure is for what you get!
reviews.title: Great hotel at a great price

likes.liked: — Brand new modern decor and furnishings

reviews.text: Great Hotel, lovely staff.. always ready to help and always had answer to all my questions..
reviews.title: Loved it!!!

aka: Auckland City Hotel-Hobson St Hotel Auckland Central
